```{r making the correlation df for all pw}

cor_matrix = data.frame()

for (n in 1:1114) {
  for (m in 1:1114) {
    cor_matrix [n,m] = cor(pw_activity_SkinnyBRCA[n,], pw_activity_SkinnyBRCA[m,],  method = "pearson", use = "complete.obs")
  }
}

#View (cor_matrix)

#rownames(pw_activity_SkinnyBRCA)



```


```{r heatmap correlation}

pheatmap (cor_matrix, angle_col=45, cellwidth = 0.25,main = "correlation heatmap for all pathways", width = 10, height = 10, fontsize = 8, show_colnames = F, show_rownames = F, cluster_rows=F, cluster_cols=F)

View (cor_matrix)


```
